testcase.name: Calculate TFSA savings for different user profiles - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Scotiabank TFSA Calculator page...........................passed When I enter "10" years for savings term....................................passed And I choose to invest with mixed income and growth.........................passed And I enter starting amount "1000"..........................................passed And I enter periodic investment "100".......................................passed And I select contribution frequency "Monthly"...............................passed And I select province "ON"..................................................passed And I enter annual income "50000"...........................................passed And I click on View Results.................................................passed Then I should see a results section displayed...............................passed
